thread.title: Arrest cops involved, say lawyers after new autopsy confirms beatings
thread.title_full: Arrest cops involved, say lawyers after new autopsy confirms beatings

title: Arrest cops involved, say lawyers after new autopsy confirms beatings
text:
Arrest cops involved, say lawyers after new autopsy confirms beatings (Updated 
The second post mortem on custodial death victim S Balamurugan has confirmed he had suffered multiple beatings while in police custody, claimed lawyers of the deceased's family. 
"The findings of the second autopsy has confirmed the fears of the family of the late Balamurugan."
